turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place an order for a coffee drink from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I can help you with that, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Doppio Espresso Macchiato with Whole Milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I will place an order for a Doppio Espresso Macchiato with whole milk, would you like anything else.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the Doppio Espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, where would you like to pick up the order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please have it ready at the 110 Donahue St location in Sausalito

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be available for pickup in 10 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I actually pick it up at a later time

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time would you like to have your order prepared

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pickup my order in 2 hours

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will have your order in 2 hours at 4pm

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually can you change my order to something else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me a Venti Caramel Macchiato with whole milk and whipped cream on top

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I have updated your order to a Venti Caramel Macchiato with whole milk with whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please confirm the whole order for me again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your Venti Caramel Macchiato with whole milk is on order at the 110 Donahue St Sausalito location and will be ready for pickup at 4pm. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you for your help today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.
